entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.5°C

entry.title: Thursday night: A few showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Showers. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind south 20 km/h becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 this evening then west 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 30%

entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
